Body:
x = np.linspace(-100, 100, 1000)
phi_peak = 10 * np.imag(1 / (25 - x - 1.0j * 2))
phi_bg = np.exp(-x ** 2 / (2 * 30 ** 2))
phi = phi_peak + phi_bg
y = 1 * np.exp(1.0j * phi)
rng = np.arange(200, 800)
pec = PhaseErrCorrectALS(smoothness_param=1, asym_param=1e-08, redux=1,
    fix_end_points=True, rng=rng, verbose=True)
pec.transform(y)
phi_pec = np.unwrap(np.angle(y))
assert np.allclose(np.sum(phi_pec[:200]), 0)
assert np.sum((phi_peak - phi_pec) ** 2) < 3.1
